TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Lookup sql overried on eft join T_STG_ADVERT on T_TMP_CURR_ADVERT.AD_ID=T_STG_ADVERT.AD_ID;
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_t_stg_advert

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT T_STG_ADVERT.CHECKSUM as CHECKSUM , T_STG_ADVERT.CLIPPER_VERSION as CLIPPER_VERSION , T_STG_ADVERT.AD_ID as AD_ID FROM T_TMP_CURR_ADVERT left join T_STG_ADVERT on T_TMP_CURR_ADVERT.AD_ID=T_STG_ADVERT.AD_ID

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: check of checksum and get the action Update or Insert
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_t_stg_advert
